headline: Onex Partners to Acquire Integrated Specialty Coverages from KKR
summary: NEW YORK & CARLSBAD, Calif., September 18, 2025--Leading global investment firms KKR and Onex today announced that Onex Partners will acquire Integrated Specialty Coverages ("ISC" or "the Company"), a tech-enabled insurance platform dedicated to designing, underwriting, and distributing insurance solutions. All ISC employees will receive substantial cash payouts on their ownership stakes in the Company.

content.title: Onex Partners to Acquire Integrated Specialty Coverages from KKR

All ISC employees will receive substantial cash payouts on their ownership stakes in the Company.

thumbnail.caption: ISC employees celebrate news of cash payouts at ownership event

headline: Vinson & Elkins Hires C.J. Polito as Energy Regulatory Lawyer at D.C. Office
summary: C.J. Polito, Vinson & Elkins New Partner — Energy Regulation By Karen Roman Vinson & Elkins said it welcomed C.J. Polito as partner in its Energy Regulatory Practice in Washington, D.C. Mr. Polito previously served at Sidley Austin and has experience in wholesale power transactions, regulations, and compliance both in the electricity and natural gas […] The post Vinson & Elkins Hires C.J. Polito as Energy Regulatory Lawyer at D.C. Office appeared first on CorpGov.

headline: KKR Expands Boston Presence with First Downtown Office at International Place
summary: BOSTON, September 18, 2025--The Chiofaro Company, in partnership with PGIM’s real estate business, today announced that KKR, a leading global investment firm, has signed a 15-year lease for 132,529 square feet at Two International Place, representing a significant milestone for Boston’s office market. KKR will relocate to the new office space to accommodate its growth in Boston, expanding its U.S. footprint, and bolstering its capabilities across key strategic areas to support its global operati
